title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project option is not.
SR:
1. Open the project.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Observe that the Close Project option is not available.
